458.name: Weitz Café
458.description: The Espresso and Coffee area serves your favorite hot and cold drinks using fair trade coffee. Add one of our house made pastries baked fresh each morning at the Carleton Bakeshop. For a quick lunch, Weitz Cafe has a variety of sandwiches or salads to choose from.
458.message:
Weitz Cafe will be closed for the Summer starting Thursday, June 5 - Monday, September 15 

 Monday - Friday | 8:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.

*Weitz Cafe follows the Academic Calendar, and will be open everyday that there are classes.  The Cafe is closed on Reading Days, Exam Days and during Breaks.
458.weekly_schedule:
Weekly Schedule

  • Lunch     Mon-Fri, 11:00 am - 3:00 pm
  • Weitz Café     Mon-Fri, 7:30 am - 3:00 pm


View/Print Weekly Menu

1.label: Vegetarian
1.description: Vegetarian: Contains no meat, fish, poultry, shellfish or products derived from these sources but may contain dairy or eggs

4.label: Vegan
4.description: Vegan: Contains absolutely no animal or dairy products.

9.label: Made without Gluten-Containing Ingredients
9.description: Made without Gluten-Containing Ingredients: does not contain ingredients that are sources of gluten, but is prepared in an open kitchen where gluten is present.

7.label: In Balance
7.description: In Balance: Contains a balanced portion of whole grains, fresh fruits and vegetables, and lean protein with a minimum amount of healthy fat.

10.label: Halal
10.description: Halal: Contains meat prepared in accordance with Muslim dietary law

11.label: Kosher
11.description: Kosher: Contains only ingredients prepared in accordance with Jewish Dietary Law

6.label: Farm to Fork
6.description: Farm to Fork: Contains seasonal, minimally processed ingredients from a local farm, ranch, or fishing boat.

55.label: Locally Crafted
55.description:
Locally Crafted: Contains products crafted by a small, locally
owned food business using socially and/or
environmentally responsible practices.

3.label: Seafood Watch
3.description: Seafood Watch: Contains seafood that meets the Monterey Bay Aquarium's Seafood Watch guidelines for commercial buyers.

18.label: Humane
18.description: Humane: Contains humanely raised meat, poultry, or eggs. Must be certified by a credible third-party animal welfare organization.

8.label: Organic
8.description: Organic: Contains at least 95 percent organically produced ingredients (by weight) from a USDA certified source

251.label: Garden Grown
251.description: Contains ingredients grown in our onsite garden

252.label: Supplier Diversity
252.description: Contains specialty food items and/or fresh ingredients expertly prepared by women and/or minority-owned businesses.

228.label: Raw/Undercooked
228.description: Raw/Undercooked: Contains (or may contain) raw or under-cooked ingredients. Consuming raw or under-cooked meat, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk for food-borne illness.

229.label: Offered Often
229.description: Offered Often: Menu items that are served often but not daily. Check in-café signage for availability.
